reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous with a pretty pattern, and one mentions it's elegant when moving. The dress fits well, with one noting it's body-hugging but not tight, and customers appreciate its comfort and quality. Moreover, the length is perfect and the material feels great, making it flattering. However, some customers report issues with the off-shoulder design rolling up. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase! I want all colors
items.body: Ignore the wrinkles! I love this dress! I’m usually not a fan of this fabric but my mind has changed. This dress is gorgeous. It’s form fitting & flattering but also stretchy & comfortable! Best of both worlds. The quality & material are great. I’m truly impressed & love this dress. It looks so good on. I don’t usually like off the shoulder either but somehow this fit works so well. Very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Tara Kim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars stunning dress
items.body: Amazing fit and color! Super comfortable and the material felt nice and breathable! Got tons of compliments and it was so comfortable to wear all night - super nice quality! Read more
items.author: Taylor Greenburg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Dress
items.body: Very nice dress. Two layers so it is not see through. The material has a lot of give so it is very comfortable. Body hugging but not tight! I highly recommend this pretty dress. Read more
items.author: Bridget K.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a bit small because it is stretchy but really a nice dress
items.body: This really was a pretty dress that looks just like the picture. Ordered the one that was labeled beige but the floral is a pale peach like the photo. I take a size 10 usually but ordered the large. It was still too small and did not fit well. I think it is my body type. I am short and full busted; I think it would look great on a taller woman with a flatter bustline. I was disappointed because it really is a nice dress for spring or summer event Read more
items.author: Kathleen M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET THE DRESS
items.body: The dress is BEAUTIFUL! If you’re debating on getting it, just do it! I got it to wear for thanksgiving dinner! I’m 5”2 and 162lbs, I got a large and it’s very comfortable, but as you can see it has a lot of stretch to it, so i could’ve sized down to a medium for a more snug body snatching fit! but i still love it in the large! also its the perfect length for short girlies, it sits at my ankles! Read more
items.author: Lea Romero

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful
items.body: This dress is true to size. I am a large. I'm 5'3. I ordered the purple and the color looks absolutely beautiful and amazing. The material is nice. I will buy again in different colors Read more
items.author: vee hon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it - don't think twice. Beautiful dress!
items.body: When I first tried this dress on, my husband's eyes about popped out of his head. I knew it was a keeper for sure. Then, when I got SO MANY complements on our cruise last week, I felt amazing. Women were telling me the dress was beautiful and I looked stunning in it. I was telling them all where I found it. I ne women asked if I was going to Salsa and said it was the perfect dress for that. So, if you Salsa, get it! I am 5'2", 128 pounds and got the small first. It fit fine, but was just a little snug on my upper arms, so I exchanged for a medium. Unfortunately I did not get a full length photo in the dress last week but will be wearing it to a wedding this month and will post an update to my review if I am able. Read more
items.author: Kim K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress!
items.body: Beautiful dress, comfortable, great length, material. Everything about it was great Read more
items.author: K.S.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Maxi Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Maxi Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Blue, Black, Coffee, Multicolored, Plum, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Purple, Dark Blue, Leopard, Teal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
